review: The Fire TV Stick was easy to set up and is easy to use.  I had to move one of my network routers closer to the TV to stop the streaming lag.  Once I did this, the Stick was plenty fast enough to produce seamless streaming.  The only complaint that I have is that their are not enough free apps.  I hope this changes with future updates.
